LanguageData.VAE_HulkBloodlust: A hunting Insectoid Hulk has entered a state of bloodlust nearby. Be careful!
LanguageData.VAE_LetterInsectoidHulk: A rampaging Insectoid Hulk is nearby!\n\nAccompanied by hostile insectoids, this creature has the ability to knock down walls and doors if it comes close to them. It will try to assault your colony and engage your colonists in a very dangerous close quarters combat.
LanguageData.VAE_OpenCocoonDesc: Open cocoon to free a trapped colonist or animal
LanguageData.VAE_Scheduled: This cocoon has been scheduled to be opened by a colonist
LanguageData.VAE_CocoonHurt: The ocupant of this coccoon is hurt, open the cocoon fast to prevent further damage!
LanguageData.VAE_CocoonCritical: The ocupant of this cocoon is critically injured, open the cocoon fast to prevent further damage!
LanguageData.VAE_CocoonDeath: The ocupant of this cocoon is dead
